scripts.dev:local: pnpm run local:setup && set -a && . ./.env && set +a && pnpm dev
scripts.local:setup: docker compose up -d && pnpm run local:env && pnpm run local:wait && pnpm run local:migrate
scripts.local:wait: echo 'Waiting for PostgreSQL...' && timeout=30 && elapsed=0 && until docker compose exec -T postgres pg_isready -U app -d app > /dev/null 2>&1; do sleep 1; elapsed=$((elapsed+1)); if [ $elapsed -ge $timeout ]; then echo 'Timeout' && exit 1; fi; done && echo 'Ready!'
